import { React, forwardRef } from "react"; import NumberFormat from "react-number-format"; import { format } from "date-fns"; import n2words from 'n2words' const SalesReturnPreviewContent = forwardRef((props, ref) => { let persianDigits = "۰۱۲۳۴۵۶۷۸۹"; let persianMap = persianDigits.split(""); function convertToPersianNumber(input) { return input.replace(/\d/g, function (m) { return persianMap[parseInt(m)]; }); } function getArabicDate(engishDate) { let event = new Date(engishDate); let options = { /*weekday: 'long', */ year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric', hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", second: "numeric", }; return event.toLocaleDateString('ar-EG', options) } return (<> {props.model.pages && props.model.pages.map((page, pageIndex) => (

  • VAT / {props.model.store ? props.model.store.vat_no : ""}
{props.model.store && props.model.store.logo ? : null}

  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.name_in_arabic : ""}

  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.title_in_arabic : ""}

  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.vat_no_in_arabic : ""} / ‫الضريبي‬ ‫الرقم‬

SALES RETURN INVOICE / فاتورة الإرجاع

  • Sales Return Date: {props.model.date ? format( new Date(props.model.date), "MMM dd yyyy h:mma" ) : ""}
  • Order: #{props.model.order_code ? props.model.order_code : ""}
  • Customer: {props.model.customer ? props.model.customer.name : ""}
  • VAT Number: {props.model.customer ? props.model.customer.vat_no : ""}
{page.firstPage && props.model.QRImageData ? : ""}
  • {props.model.code ? props.model.code : ""} :عائد المبيعات
  • تاريخ عودة المبيعات: {props.model.date ? getArabicDate(props.model.date) : ""}
  • {props.model.order_code ? props.model.order_code : ""} :طلب
  • عميل: {props.model.customer ? props.model.customer.name_in_arabic : ""}
  • الرقم الضريبي للعميل: {props.model.customer ? props.model.customer.vat_no_in_arabic : ""}
{props.model.total_pages ? "Page " + (pageIndex + 1) + " of " + props.model.total_pages : ""}
{props.model.total_pages ? convertToPersianNumber(props.model.total_pages.toString()) + " الصفحة " + convertToPersianNumber((pageIndex + 1).toString()) + " من " : ""}
{page.products && page.products.map((product, index) => ( ))}

{index + 1 + (pageIndex * props.model.pageSize)} {product.part_number ? product.part_number : ""} {product.name}{product.name_in_arabic ? "/" + product.name_in_arabic : ""} {product.quantity.toFixed(2)} {product.unit ? product.unit : ""} value} /> value} />

 {props.model.delivered_by_signature ? : null}
